character.name: Tanjiro
character.quote: I Can Do It. I Know I Can Do It. I'm The Guy Who Gets It Done, Broken Bones Or Not. No Matter What, I Can Do It! I Can Fight!
desc: his younger sister alive but a demon

character.name: Zenitsu
character.quote: People don't simply recover instantly. No matter how strong someone is, they can feel pain and sadness. But hiding from it solves nothing. You must rouse your aching heart and stand back up. I'm sure Rengoku was that kind of person.
desc: has a sparrow as his animal

character.name: Inosuke
character.quote: It's Not About Going First. It's About The Overall Flow.
desc: can dislocate his arms willy nilly
ripped but has a feminine face
